markdown:
<title level="1" right="Rules">[Deity](/Rules.aspx?ID=2048)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 26 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Write down the deity your character worships, if any. Clerics must worship a deity. See pages 35–39 for more about Pathfinder's deities.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
name: Deity
